snippet: The recent history of two-term presidencies shows that things could be a lot better. Or much worse.
abstract: Political Memo; historians caution against predictions that second term of Pres Obama's presidency is doomed; recent history of two-term presidencies of Richard M Nixon, Dwight D Eisenhower, Ronald Reagan and George W Bush shows that all ultimately managed significant  second-term accomplishments despite partisan opposition on Capitol Hill.
lead_paragraph: The recent history of two-term presidencies shows that things could be a lot better. Or much worse.

headline.main: History Says Obama, in Second Term, Has Time Yet to Make Impact
headline.print_headline: History Says Obama, in Second Term, Has Time Yet to Make Impact
